FKE Seminar Series – Dr Setia Hermawati
=======================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Apr 16, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/FKE-Seminar-April23rd-1080x675.jpeg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All postgraduate students are cordially invited to attend a seminar organized by the FKE Seminar Committee, which is scheduled as follow:

Speaker: Dr Setia Hermawati  
Affiliation: Faculty of Engineering, University of Nottingham  
Title: From Industry 4.0 to Industry 5.0  
Date: 23 April 2024 (Tuesday)  
Time: 9.00 AM – 10.00 AM  
Venue: Active Learning Classroom, Level 5, P19a  
Moderator: Prof Ir Dr Sharifah Hafizah Syed Ariffin

We are looking forward to your participation. Postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement.  
Thank you.
